description: Go-go-stop for a slice of this one-pan dinner, packed with corn, tomatoes, spinach and tasty cheese. Plus, they're a nutritionally approved meal that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Traffic-Light Rice Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease and line a 30 x 20cm (base measurement) slice pan with baking paper, allowing paper to overhang. Whisk eggs, rice, corn, spinach and cheese in a bowl. Season.
Pour mixture into prepared pan. Smooth surface. Arrange tomatoes, cut-side up, on top of mixture.
Bake for 40 minutes or until just set at centre and golden brown. Remove from oven. Stand in pan for 10 minutes. Transfer to a chopping board, then cut into 12 pieces. Serve.
